name: Block Breaker (Arkanoid)
description:
This is my first game.

Created while viewing the course: https://www.udemy.com/course/unitycourse/

Module 5: Block Breaker

Added by Magic))) Fireball. Menus, cheate codes and music. Improved ball movements and visual effects.

I plan to add a Boss battle. This is all so exciting and takes so long. I would like to continue education. Maybe I will add later.

PS Music I taked from the best game of ever DOS2. I hope they do not condemn me)))

Thanks you for playing))
